import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import Dropzone from '../../imageSetting/Dropezone' import Cropper from 'react-easy-crop' import getCroppedImg from '../../imageSetting/cropImage' import spinner from '../../../img/spinner.gif' const CreatePetProfile = ({createPet, history}) => { const [petFormData, setPetFormData] = useState({ name:'', sex:'', type:'', race:'', age:null, images:[], descreption:'', traind:false, cost:'' }) const [photos, setPhotos] = useState([]) const { name, sex, type, race, age, traind, images, descreption, cost } = petFormData const getBase64 = (image) => { return new Promise((resolve,reject) => { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => resolve(reader.result); reader.onerror = error => reject(error); reader.readAsDataURL(image) })} const onDrop =async e =>{ console.log(petFormData) console.log(petFormData.images) } return (
